caption:
✨Peppermint Brownie Bark✨

This healthy holiday bark is perfect for a last minute treat - easy to make and just a few ingredients!

I used @evohemp brownie chip hemp bars and added some CBD oil for extra benefits 💆‍♀️ You can head to evohemp.com and get 40% off your purchase today!!

Here's the recipe:

Peppermint Brownie Bark
🔸1 cup dark chocolate
🔸3 dropperfuls @evohemp CBD oil
🔸1 tsp peppermint flavoring
🔸1-2 @evohemp Brownie Chip Hemp Bars

Instructions
(1) Melt dark chocolate (2) Mix in CBD oil and peppermint flavoring (3) Crush up a hemp bar and mix into the chocolate (4) Spread out on a lined baking sheet (5) Top with more hemp bar pieces (6) Place in the fridge and chill for at least 20 minutes to set (7) Cut to desired size and enjoy!

#evohemp #cbd #cbdoil #peppermintbark #easydessert #lowcarbdessert #proteinbar #healthydessert #nobakedessert #glutenfreedairyfree
